Media Reviews

This program makes us think of a Swiss Army Knife, or perhaps a well-stocked, well-organized desk drawer. There are all kinds of helpful tools here and we think PicPick would be iseful to Web designers, graphic designers, and even the average computer user who ocaasionally needs to work with graphics

CNET Download.com

Specially desinged for the home user and aiming at giving as much flexibility as possible during the work. It even includes some features never to be found in Photoshop. PicPick, besides being a very easy to use image editor also sports graphic capture options and a set of hotkeys and options some similar editors would envy.
